title: 📝 Daily Summary — February 18, 2026
content:
**February 18, 2026**

## What We Built

### Mission Control
- **Dynamic weather backgrounds** — gradient header card with real-time weather conditions (WeatherWidget.js, WeatherHeaderBackground)
- **Customizable split view system** — up to 5 horizontal columns with localStorage persistence
- **Live content panels** — wired email, contacts, keys, cron jobs, and Fred chat into split panes
- **Cron Jobs panel** — pause/resume/delete controls with 60s auto-refresh
- **Fred ChatBar** — AI assistant chat interface (replaced abandoned Telegram integration)

### Stratify
- **Live TradingView charts** — fixed 1m/5m candle creation with proper intraday time display, 3s polling
- **Crypto trading page** — TradingView chart + Alpaca L2 orderbook + order entry with Supabase persistence
- **Analytics wiring** — connected to live user strategy/trade/account data from Supabase
- **Discord integration** — webhook + market summary crons
- **Terminal strategy flow** — fixed selection lag and click reliability
- **Order tickets** — dark themed with resize panels and Alpaca parity
- **Global market clocks** — world clock bar with open/close countdowns (mm:ss in final hour)
- **Fred page widgets** — compact layout with glass market overview tabs, forex matrix, economic calendar
- **Brand logos** — exact SVG/PNG assets from Stripe, Supabase, Claude, Vercel, Alpaca sites

## What We Fixed

### Mission Control
- **Vercel deploy cache issue** — "Telegram" label persisted despite code reverts (forced empty commit pushed)
- **Telegram integration fully reverted** — removed webhook, chat panel, replaced with Fred

### Stratify
- **Chart fixes** — 1m/5m live candle creation, timeVisible:true, reduced lookback, proper polling
- **Alpaca connection loop** — fixed crypto stream hitting rate limits
- **Strategy save flow** — restored clean view, fixed risk control edits
- **Fred page clipping** — fixed layout overflow issues
- **Order allocation** — autofill from key trade setups
- **Setup gate checks** — deploy blocked until 6 setup requirements met

## Key Decisions

### Mission Control
- **Split view architecture** — localStorage-based column system for flexible workspace layout
- **Fred over Telegram** — dropped Telegram bot in favor of simpler integrated chat

### Stratify
- **Real brand assets** — use exact logos from official sites (no custom recreations)
- **Crypto L2 orderbook** — ToS-style depth visualization
- **Per-user state** — Supabase RLS for terminal, trades, history, portfolio
- **Global market awareness** — prominent world clock bar with countdowns
